data.actual_result: an empty line divider makes its way in to ruin your day.
data.expected_result: Messages stay after each other normally
data.short_description: Writing a message, a message with a link and another message without a link causes weird padding to happen without embeds
data.steps_to_repro: - Start Discord - Go into a server you can write messages in - Write a message with a text meme - Paste this link with a message: https://trello.com/c/tygwwQpP/ - Write another text meme
